description: This file defines configuration handling for a performance monitoring backend, including a dataclass for configuration parameters, functions to read configuration data (notably the MongoDB URI) from files and environment variables, and a function to load and validate the configuration.

classes.name: BackendConfig
classes.description: Immutable dataclass storing runtime configuration parameters for the backend, including MongoDB URI, metrics sampling interval, retention days, alert evaluation interval, alert cooldown, and recommendation settings.

methods.name: Optional[str] _read_mongo_uri_from_db_connection_file()
methods.description: Attempts to read and extract a MongoDB URI from a specific connection file located relative to the script path.

methods.name: BackendConfig load_config()
methods.description: Loads the backend configuration, prioritizing the URI from the connection file, falling back to environment variables, and constructing a BackendConfig instance with validated parameters.
